jadex.examples.ping
Agent Pinging

jadex.examples.ping.Pinging
  • jadex.planlib.Ping
    • agent Pinging
    contains jadex.planlib.Ping


    Agent arguments:
    ping_receiver AgentIdentifier

    The pinging agent pings another agent.

    Send ping requests in certain intervals.
